entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 19.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 32 this morning and minus 26 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 35.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 35. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 21 February 2023
